import React , {useEffect , useState} from 'react' import edit_btn from '../icons/edit_btn.svg' import adding from '../icons/adding.svg' import left_arrow from '../icons/left_arrow.svg' import {useParams } from "react-router-dom" function Project() { const params = useParams() ; const [data , setDate] = useState() const project_id = params.id useEffect(()=>{ getData(); },[]) let getData = async () => { let respons = await fetch (`http://127.0.0.1:8000/task/${project_id}`) let data = await respons.json() setDate(data) } console.log(data) return (
setShow(false)} />
